name: The Legend of Keiran
description:
In, The Legend of Keiran, you play as Keiran, the small but brave anti-hero who goes on an adventure to save his people.  This is a small jam project with two levels and the smallest bit of story.

Known Issues:

  • Ball Speed can be way to slow or way to fast (sometimes just right)
  • Ball can get stuck in annoying loops 
  • UI gets cut of if not in full screen

Made with the random prompts of:

Genre: Breakout Cone, 

Goal: Destroy all Objects

Limitation: Reach a destination

Theme: evil, defeat the lone hero!

Randomness: Contamination 

Made over 2 days with just under 8 hours work time for the LearnJam. 

Credits... Soon (TM)
